bgm.name: 世界が平和になった夜

parameters: ステージ効果（王都ギルド）黒
ステージ効果（王都ギルド）灯
MAPネーム（王都エルディア）
But I've come to report that I've completed the request.」
\N<Guild Staff>「Ah, Nii-sama, thank you for your hard work even at this late hour.」
\N<Guild Staff>「Then, could you please submit the request form and the hunted parts？」
\N<Guild Staff>「Now then, since you have reached the required points,
I would like to promote Nii-sama’s adventurer rank,」
\N<Guild Staff>「Can we proceed with the procedure now？」
\N<Guild Staff>「It will take a little time, so please wait inside the guild.」
\N<Guild Staff>「We’ll call you as soon as the new card is ready.」
\N<\n[1]>「Phew… I’ve finally reached Bronze Rank, huh……」
\N<\n[1]>「Now I finally feel like a full-fledged adventurer！」
\N<\n[1]>「Well, it seems like it’ll take some
time for the guild card to be updated,」
\N<\n[1]>「So Let’s take a little walk inside the guild.」
\N<\n[1]>「I haven’t received my new guild card yet.」
\N<\n[1]>「I’ll go outside the guild after I receive the card.」
\N<\n[1]>「Hmm…… It doesn’t seem like there’s any quest I’m looking for…」
\N<\n[1]>「Cleaning wells and tidying up are important,
but they’re not really tasks for adventurers, right?」
\N<\n[1]>「It’s safer and easier to earn money than slaying monsters, but there’s no romance in it.」
\N<\n[1]>「There’s a map that marks the locations where dangerous monsters have been spotted.」
\N<\n[1]>「Sharing information is important for adventurers too.」
\N<Adventurer>「The royal capital has become safer lately,
So it’s about time I head to another land for work…」
\N<\n[1]>「Don’t you take jobs other than subjugation？」
\N<Adventurer>「That's true, but I can't do anything other than fight…。」
\N<Adventurer>「If you were to take on requests other than combat,
What kind of requests would you take？」
\N<Adventurer>「Could you tell me, just for reference？」
Requests that make you feel energized would be nice！
Requests that make use of my charm…… perhaps.
Taking care of children, walking dogs…… stuff like that？？
Requests that make you feel energized would be nice！
\N<Adventurer>「Feel energized？？ What kind of requests are those？？」
\N<\n[1]>「You asked me what kind of requests I’d like, so I answered.」
\N<Adventurer>「……Yeah, I guess the way I asked was bad.」
\N<Adventurer>「Well, then I’ll go check out the quest board a bit more……。」
Requests that make use of my charm…… perhaps.
\N<Adventurer>「Charm？ What kind of requests are those？」
Or maybe a clothing model would be nice！」
\N<Adventurer>"I don’t think there are such requests…？」
\N<Adventurer>"Because this is an adventurer’s guild, right？
If there were requests, they’d come from the merchant guild, wouldn’t they？」
It wouldn’t be strange if I got an offer, right？」
\N<Adventurer>「Well, then I’ll go check out the quest board a bit more……。」
Taking care of children, walking dogs…… stuff like that？？
\N<\n[1]>「That’s right, domestic or safe jobs？ Those are good.」
\N<Adventurer>"Then, if a request comes in asking you to cook, why not take it？」
\N<\n[1]>「Would such a request come to the adventurer’s guild？？」
my cooking threw it at me….」
\N<Adventurer>「That's…… Any idea what might’ve caused it?」
They said there was a poisonous plant in it.」
\N<\n[1]>「I thought it would be a good accent to the flavor……
\N<Adventurer>「It seems like there’s something you need to learn before cooking.」
\N<Adventurer>「I think that’s something you shouldn’t be saying…….」
\N<Adventurer>「Well, then I’ll go check out the quest board a bit more……。」
\N<Adventurer>「It’s good that it’s safe…… but for me,
It’s a matter of life and death…….」
\N<Adventurer>「Oh？ Isn’t that Nii？ You’re late today.」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes, it took a bit longer to get here.」
Don’t push yourself too hard, keep it in moderation.」
\N<\n[1]>「Oh！ By the way, me！ My adventurer rank is going up！」
\N<Adventurer>「Bronze, huh? You’re a full-fledged adventurer now.」
\N<Adventurer>「Starting from Stone, then Iron, Bronze, Silver……」
\N<Adventurer>「It’s famous for being a wall to rank up from Iron……」
\N<\n[1]>「That’s right…… And someday！ Gold！ Platinum！ Mithril！！」
\N<Adventurer>「Ahaha, it’s good to talk about dreams.」
\N<\n[1]>「It’s not a dream！ It’s a goal！！」
\N<Adventurer>「That’s right, then let’s toast to the future hero.」
\N<Adventurer>「It’s good to work hard, but make sure to take proper breaks too, okay？」
\N<\n[1]>「Yes！ No problem！ I’m letting off steam at the tavern！」
\N<Adventurer>「Nii has a bad drinking habit… I’m worried.」
\N<Adventurer>「I heard your rank is going up, congratulations.」
\N<Adventurer>「You’re still young but already at Bronze Rank, you’ve got talent.」
\N<Adventurer>「I’m at Silver Rank, but I’d like to spar with you sometime.」
\N<\n[1]>「Yeah… under a clear night sky, I don’t think I’d lose！」
\N<Adventurer>「What do you mean?? A spell… or something?」
\N<\n[1]>「No no, I just wanted to say it！」
\N<Adventurer>「Yeah… I think this might be my limit around here.」
\N<Adventurer>「To rank up from silver, you absolutely need talent.」
\N<Adventurer>「Effort alone can never catch up... reality is harsh.」
\N<Adventurer>「If I had even one special talent... I'd probably be...」
Always wishing for what I don't have.」
\N<\n[1]>「No, I was just wondering what you're doing here.」
\N<Adventurer>「Not doing anything special, just waiting for my comrades.」
\N<Adventurer>「Who knows, they probably drank too much and passed out...」
\N<\n[1]>「Huh？ Then shouldn't you go look for them？！」
\N<Adventurer>「You clean up your own mess, that's what an adventurer does.」
\N<Adventurer>「I'll just wait, I won't do anything more than that.」
\N<\n[1]>\c[1]（Hmm, waiting for them like this seems kind of nice...）」
\N<Adventurer>「I'll just wait, I won't do anything more than that.」
\N<Adventurer>"But if they don't come soon... it's going to be a problem.」
\N<Adventurer>"Hey, Nii. You look all excited, something happen？」
\N<\n[1]>「Me！ I'm finally getting promoted to Bronze Rank！」
\N<Adventurer>"With your skills, you can aim even higher.」
\N<Adventurer>"It's been a while since I met Nii, so Bronze Rank, huh...」
\N<Adventurer>"That's why！ I'm telling you the quest details
and the reward amount don't match！！」
It's because the condition of the materials is poor.」
\N<Guild Staff>"Even if you say that, these materials are for processing, so...」
\N<Guild Staff>「It’s only natural that the value changes
depending on the condition of the materials.」
\N<Adventurer>「That’s up to your judgment, isn’t it?!
I’m begging you！ If this keeps up, I won’t be able to pay the bills…」
\N<Guild Staff>「Even if you say that, it’s against the rules, so it’s impossible.」
\N<Guild Staff>「I believe it’s written in the request form, isn’t it？ Didn’t you check it？」
\N<Adventurer>「That kind of thing… there’s no way I’d check every single detail！」
\N<\n[1]>\c[1]（That receptionist, she’s amazing with her firm attitude…）
She’s more impressive than most adventurers around here…）
Otherwise… I’ll lose even my place to sleep…」
\N<Guild Staff>「That’s unrelated to the guild, please sign quickly.」
\N<Adventurer>「Huh? You’re that kid I often see at the guild, aren’t you?」
\N<Adventurer>「Make sure to prioritize safety and do your best.」
\N<Adventurer>「What are you looking at！? It’s not something to show off！！」
\N<Adventurer>「What’s with you…? Acting all cocky like that.」
\N<Adventurer>「A brat like you would fit better in a brothel than in the guild！」
\N<\n[1]>「Haa… not yet？ I feel like quite some time has passed…？」
I guess a celebratory drink is a must… hehehe.」
\N<Adventurer B>「Yeah, no doubt about it, I saw it with my own eyes.」
\N<Adventurer A>「So, where exactly was that blue light shining！？」
\N<Adventurer B>「Hmm, I'm not sure about the exact location,
But I’m pretty sure it was… out in the frontier, right？」
\N<Adventurer A>「Haah… the frontier… that’s way too far…」
\N<\n[1]>「Hey, could you tell me a bit more about that story？」
\N<Adventurer B>「Huh？ Was it that interesting of a story？？」
\N<Adventurer B>「Hmm… but it was just a few days ago that I saw it…」
\N<\n[1]>「Are you sure it was a blue light！？」
\N<Adventurer B>「It was a strong beam of light, rising into the sky…」
\N<Adventurer A>「Really… I still can’t believe it, you know？？」
\N<Adventurer B>「Huh！？ Are you saying I’m lying！！」
\N<Adventurer B>「My bad, I got a little heated.」
\N<\n[1]>「So, where was that light shining from！？」
\N<Adventurer B>「Nah~, I don’t know the exact location.」
\N<Adventurer B>「But there’s no big city in that direction,
So I’m guessing… it’s probably the frontier.」
\N<\n[1]>「The frontier… how far is that from the royal capital！？」
\N<Adventurer B>「Huh？ I don’t know that much.」
\N<Adventurer A>「But when you say frontier……that reminds me of that……」
\N<\n[1]>「That？？ What do you mean by that？？」
\N<Adventurer A>「Ah, It’s a request form I saw yesterday,
and I’m pretty sure the requester was from a frontier village……」
\N<Adventurer B>「Ah, that request, yeah, it was definitely suspicious.」
\N<Adventurer B>「A request from a frontier village to the royal capital?
That’s something that happens maybe once a year, if at all.」
\N<Adventurer A>「Right？ Plus, it’s a long distance.」
\N<Adventurer A>「No one’s gonna go all the way to some remote countryside for a request.」
\N<\n[1]>「Is that request form still at the guild？」
\N<Adventurer A>「Dunno, you could ask the receptionist lady.」
\N<\n[1]>「……Got it, thanks for the interesting story！」
\N<Adventurer A>「You’re thinking of taking that request！？」
\N<Adventurer A>「But I think the appropriate rank for that request was……」
\N<Guild Staff>「The card information update is complete,
So please come to the reception desk.」
\N<\n[1]>「Ah, it seems the card is ready.」
\N<Guild Staff>「We apologize for the long wait.」
\N<Guild Staff>「Then, here is your new adventurer card.」
\N<Guild Staff>「Is there any mistake in the recorded information？」
\N<Guild Staff>「Then we’ll hand over the card and that will be the end.」
\N<Guild Staff>「Nii-sama, once again, congratulations on your rank-up.」
\N<\n[1]>「Ah, um！？ Can I have a moment？？！」
\N<\n[1]>「I heard there was a request from a village in the frontier…」
\N<Guild Staff>「A village in the frontier… yes, there is indeed a request.」
\N<\n[1]>「Can you tell me what it’s about!？」
\N<Guild Staff>「Hehe, well, it’s fine for you, Nii-sama, a Bronze Adventurer.」
\N<Guild Staff>「Originally, that request was for Bronze Adventurers and above.」
\N<\n[1]>「Is that so? That’s why I didn’t know about it……」
\N<Guild Staff>「But it’s different now, you know？」
\N<Guild Staff>「You’re a splendid Bronze Adventurer-sama after all♪」
\N<Guild Staff>「Then, I’ll briefly explain the contents of the request, is that okay？」
The requester is the frontier village…… Altea…… it says here.」
\N<Guild Staff>「They want someone to investigate the
inside of the tower west of the village.」
because monsters have been overflowing from it for a few days now……」
\N<Guild Staff>「Also, we’ve heard that the tower lit up.」
\N<Guild Staff>「So, you’re looking for Bronze adventurers or above who can fight, right?」
\N<Guild Staff>「Huh？ Oh, yes, the frontier is unpopular……」
\N<Guild Staff>「If you could take it, it would really help us out…… Are you sure？？」
\N<\n[1]>「I’m sure！ That request is perfect for me！！」
\N<Guild Staff>「W-well…… We have no reason to refuse.」
\N<Guild Staff>「Do you agree to accept this request？」
\N<Guild Staff>「This is your first request as a Bronze Adventurer, good luck.」
\N<Guild Staff>「It's already night. Wouldn't it be better to move by
\N<\n[1]>「No, I want to save on travel expenses as much as possible！！」
\{\CL And so, the bronze adventurer, Nii Faulen,
Set off on a journey to the frontier village
\{\CL10 days after departing from the royal capital―
